law.catch_line: Unless authorized under this subtitle to engage in the practice of providing vocational rehabilitati...
law.text:
Unless authorized under this subtitle to engage in the practice of providing vocational rehabilitation services, an individual may not:
be reimbursed under this title for the provision of vocational rehabilitation services; or
represent to the public by use of a title, including "registered rehabilitation consultant", by description of services, methods, procedures, or otherwise, that the individual is authorized to engage in the practice of providing vocational rehabilitation services in the State.
